general_advisory: Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetables nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. For early and maximum yield in Cole crops spray Gibberellic Acid 0.001% L. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly.

advisory: Rodent/Rats: If 'Rodent/Rats' problem is noticed, locate the rodent burrow in the crop field and surrounding areas. Place Aluminium Phosphide tablet to kill the rodents.
Stored grain insect pest: Take up fumigation using Aluminium phosphide tablets in air-tight containers to prevent infestation.
Tobacco Caterpillar: Collect and destroy egg mass and caterpillar of the pest. Monitor the emergence of adult moths by setting up Pheromone traps. Apply insecticides as needed.
Aphids and Thrips: Spray neem-based pesticide or chemically spray recommended insecticides for infestation control.
Diamond Back Moth: Install light traps and use neem-based pesticide. Spray recommended insecticides if infestation occurs.
Planting: Plant Dwarf Cavendish and Robusta variety in specified distances and pit size. Use disease-free suckers or tissue culture suckers.
Make necessary arrangements to provide heat to chicks during night hours. Ensure proper brooding arrangement and cleanliness in poultry house.
